meta.title: about us
meta.description: mrozilla is run by Jan Hrubý—originally from the Czech Republic, lived in Finland and the United Kingdom, currently residing in Vienna, Austria

hero.title: mrozilla is run by Jan Hrubý—originally from the Czech Republic, lived in Finland and the United Kingdom, currently residing in Vienna, Austria

about.title: focus
about.text: Jan builds digital products, mainly web & native applications. Everything from concepts & product exploration, through UX, UI, visual & brand design, all the way to software development. He's done some [work in the past](/#work), and will probably do some more in the future.

about.title: design
about.text: Jan designs in Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe XD, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Lightroom, and Adobe After Effects.

about.title: code
about.text: Jan codes in Javascript: [React](https://github.com/facebook/react), (and [Hyperapp](https://github.com/hyperapp/hyperapp)), [Redux](https://github.com/reactjs/redux), (and [Apollo](https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-client)), [styled-components](https://github.com/styled-components/styled-components), (and [picostyle](https://github.com/picostyle/picostyle)), [Node](https://github.com/nodejs/node) & [Express](https://github.com/expressjs/express). He usually edits that code in [VS Code](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode), lints it with [ESLint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint) & [Prettier](https://github.com/prettier/prettier), and posts it on [Github](https://github.com).

about.title: education
about.text: Jan happens to have [M.Sc.](http://www4.ntu.ac.uk/nbs/international/transnational_education/joint_degrees/index.html) and [Ing.](https://www.fbm.vutbr.cz/en/applicants/european-business-and-finance) degrees in European Business and Finance for some reason.

about.title: contact
about.text: You can reach out to Jan on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mrozilla), [Medium](https://medium.com/mrozilla), [Github](https://github.com/mrozilla), [Linkedin](https://linkedin.com/in/mrozilla), or just send [an email](mailto:jan@mrozilla.cz).
